page.title: 10THE PRIEST
page.content: Mr Brockie is the priest who comes to our school on several Fridays throughout the school year. He is the priest of St Lukes Episcopal Church serving the Gorgie, Dalry and Wester Hailes area of Edinburgh. In addition to our school, he also visits Clovenstone Primary and Westburn Primary. Mr Brockie's church is unique in that he has no specific building in which to worship. Instead he uses peoples homes or, when he requires larger premises for special occasions, he uses a hall. He felt that the money required of a church and its upkeep would be put to a better use helping needy people. His parents were married in Glasgow but moved to England where his father worked on a ship. Mr Brockie previously lived in England for 25yrs.
